title: CINEBOOK
body: My passion for movies and a frustrating experience led me to create a professional and user-friendly movie booking website that simplifies the process of reserving tickets. This platform offers convenience and efficiency to moviegoers, providing a seamless solution for a hassle-free movie-watching experience.Movie Tickets booking web application,with Three modules User, Theater and Admin. Enabled the admin to add movies and the theater to request a movie reservation which the admin can approve or reject.Implemented functionality that allowsthe approved theater to add movies, screensinformation.

title: Theora
body: Theora is an online learning platform designed to provide a seamless onlinelearning experience.With Theora, students can access courses, track their progress, and interact with instructors and peersServices used: S3 Bucket, JWT Tokens, Presigned URLs, EC2,React.js, Redux,Node.js, Express, Javascript, MongoDB

title: Shoemaze
body: Introducing a robust MERN stack e-commerce website for dress enthusiasts, crafted with passion.Powered by #nodejs and #MongoDB as the robust backend, and enhanced with Handlebars as the sleek frontend view engine, this project showcases the seamless integration of cutting-edge technologies.Throughout this project, I encountered numerous challenges that pushed me to grow and learn. I extend my heartfelt gratitude to #Brototype for providing the perfect platform to sharpen my skills. Special thanks to my advisors and reviewers for their unwavering support and guidance.Deployed on Amazon Web Services (#AWS), leveraging the power of NGINX as both a proxy server and a load balancer, this project guarantees a smooth and scalable user experience. Version control was managed using Git and GitHub.

title: Pdf-React
body: Welcome to the PDF Extract Application, a web-based tool for extracting specific pages from PDF files. This application allows users to upload PDFs, select the pages they want to extract, and then generate and download a new PDF containing only the selected pages.

title: User Management System
body: User management system with an admin side built using React, Node, Redux, REST API, Express, and MongoDB. The system allows for the creation, deletion, and editing of user accounts, as well as the management of User profile picture. It also includes a robust admin interface for managing the users.

title: CloudCast
body: CloudCast - weather web app made in Node Express using Mapbox Geocode API and Weatherstack API would allow users to get real-time weather information for a given location. The app would use server-side rendering with Handlebars to dynamically display the weather data on the webpage.
